Typedef Polylidar::VUI¶

  • Defined in File Types.hpp

Typedef Documentation¶

using Polylidar::VUI = std::vector<size_t>¶

Vector of unsigned integers. Often used to represent a set of triangle indices all spatially connected, aka a plane.
